overview:
Clean Name Blueprint was founded by industry insiders to give everyone the power to have clean search engine results.

Search engine results can be some of the most important thing people see about you on the internet, and they often use Google to determine what kind of person you are. This makes online reputation management a vital tool for anyone looking to move forward in their career or education.

We are here to show you the tools that you need to manage your own search results without paying professionals to do it for you. Professionals command a premium price for their time, but you can manage your own search engine results for free.

Clean Name Blueprint breaks everything down into easy to understand steps so even someone with the most basic knowledge about the internet can start improving their online reputation. If you know how to set up a Facebook or LinkedIn account you already have all the knowledge you need to begin cleaning your search engine results.

Become and online reputation and search engine optimization expert with the Clean Name Blueprint!
